content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recalled past events where I was created and there were no new developments to report. However, I received a command from the user to use the Google command to search for language learning resources and travel guides. The user\'s goal is to learn different languages and explore the world, and their plan is to save any useful links to a file for future reference. The command used was "google" with the argument "best language learning resources".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/online-language-learning-for-kids/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "language_resources.txt", "text": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/\\nhttps://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language\\nhttps://www.alllanguageresources.com/\\nhttps://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources\\nhttps://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/\\nhttps://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html\\nhttps://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/\\nhttps://www.fluentu.com/blog/online-language-learning-for-kids/"}}}'}]
"""
